channel.title: learning on The Unhandled Exception Podcast
channel.description: Recent content in learning on The Unhandled Exception Podcast

item.title: Episode 30: Developer Productivity with (me!) Dan Clarke
item.description: Developer productivity is something I’ve been really interested in for quite a few years. So I decided, rather than having a guest on for this topic - it’s one I wanted to cover myself. So in this first episode of the year - I’ve gone solo, and talk about the things I find have made a big difference to my productivity over the years. Also why I think this term “10x developer” is a big understatement!

item.title: Episode 16: Learning and Self Development with James World
item.description: In this episode, I was joined by James World to chat about learning! We covered an incredible amount in this episode - from certifications, to books and reading, interviews, what it means to be a senior developer, and much much more! Links from the show James' Links Twitter LinkedIn (please include a note in your connection request so you stand out from the recruiter bots! Maybe a book recommendation?
